headline: KKR Bets On Sustainable Protein Demand With ProTen Investment In Australia
summary: KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE:KKR) has struck a deal on Wednesday to acquire ProTen Pty Limited, a major player in Australia’s poultry farming infrastructure, from Aware Super, a leading Australian pension fund. The agreement marks a strategic move by KKR to further expand its investments in the agricultural sector. Founded in 2001, ProTen operates hundreds of poultry sheds across more than 60 farms, playing a crucial role in the country’s poultry production and food supply chain. Also Read: Modine Acqui
